== Bio ==
Salman Toor has done his Masters and PhD in Scientific Computing from
Uppsala University, Sweden. In 2014, Toor finished his postdoctoral
research in distributed computing infrastructures from Helsinki
Institute of Physics, Finland. His area of expertise include management,
scalability and performance of distributed computational and storage
infrastructures for scientific applications. He is also an active member
of Distributed Computing Applications (DCA) group at Uppsala University.
